data.label: Knowledge Graph Operator
data.name: knowledge_graph_operator
data.description: Extract Documents and persist into graph database.

inputs.label: Chunks
inputs.name: chunks
inputs.description: The text split chunks by chunk manager.

outputs.label: Chunks
outputs.name: chunks
outputs.description: The assembled chunks, it has been persisted to graph store.

parameters.label: Knowledge Graph Connector
parameters.name: graph_store
parameters.description: The knowledge graph.

outputs.label: Chunks
outputs.name: chunks
outputs.description: The split chunks by chunk manager.

parameters.label: Chunk Split Parameters
parameters.name: chunk_parameters
parameters.description: Chunk Split Parameters.

parameters.label: Builtin Knowledge Graph Config.
parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Builtin Knowledge Graph Config.

parameters.label: Graph Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of Graph, if not set, will use the default name.

parameters.label: Embedding Function
parameters.name: embedding_fn
parameters.description: The embedding function of vector store, if not set, will use the default embedding function.

parameters.label: Max Chunks Once Load
parameters.name: max_chunks_once_load
parameters.description: The max number of chunks to load at once. If your document is large, you can set this value to a larger number to speed up the loading process. Default is 10.

parameters.label: Max Threads
parameters.name: max_threads
parameters.description: The max number of threads to use. Default is 1. If you set this bigger than 1, please make sure your vector store is thread-safe.

parameters.label: Knowledge Graph Type
parameters.name: graph_store_type
parameters.description: graph store type.

parameters.label: LLM Client
parameters.name: llm_client
parameters.description: llm client for extract graph triplets.

parameters.label: LLM Model Name
parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: llm model name.

parameters.label: Chroma Config
parameters.name: vector_store_config
parameters.description: the chroma config of vector store.

parameters.label: Collection Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of vector store, if not set, will use the default name.

parameters.label: User
parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The user of vector store, if not set, will use the default user.

parameters.label: Password
parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of vector store, if not set, will use the default password.

parameters.label: Embedding Function
parameters.name: embedding_fn
parameters.description: The embedding function of vector store, if not set, will use the default embedding function.

parameters.label: Max Chunks Once Load
parameters.name: max_chunks_once_load
parameters.description: The max number of chunks to load at once. If your document is large, you can set this value to a larger number to speed up the loading process. Default is 10.

parameters.label: Max Threads
parameters.name: max_threads
parameters.description: The max number of threads to use. Default is 1. If you set this bigger than 1, please make sure your vector store is thread-safe.

parameters.label: Persist Path
parameters.name: persist_path
parameters.description: the persist path of vector store.
